Nonetheless we take all threats seriously and have increased the security presence at the Enron Center still further.
Once again, if you observe suspicious behavior, please call security at 3-6200.

answer: The email content regarding Change of Control Provisions is not provided in the given information, so a summary cannot be generated. Please share the full text of the email for a concise summary.

As many of you know, I have a provision in my employment contract which provides for a payment of $20 million per year for the remaining term of my contract in the event of a change of control of Enron.
The merger with Dynegy, or a similar transaction with any other company, would trigger this provision on closing.
Assuming the merger with Dynegy is closed within 6-9 months, as we expect, this provision would entitle me to total payments of slightly more than $60 million.

question: Summarize the following email: Org Chart - Introduction
answer: The email content for "Org Chart - Introduction" is not provided in the information section, so a summary cannot be generated. Please share the actual text of the email to get a concise summary.
expected_answer:
Sally - Lloyd Will and I would like to swing by and make a quick introduction.
